home.title: BRIKER - Construction Logistics Platform
home.meta_description: BRIKER is your all-in-one platform for construction logistics. Order your materials from Castorama, Leroy Merlin and have them delivered directly to your construction site. Join thousands of satisfied construction professionals.

header.main_title: Manage your construction sites on one platform
header.description: The complete logistics solution for construction sites - Order your materials and have them delivered directly to your site

footer.description: BRIKER is your all-in-one platform for construction logistics. Order your materials and have them delivered directly to your site. Connect with trusted suppliers and optimize your workflows.

services.description: Complete logistics platform for construction professionals

about.title: About
about.meta_description: Discover BRIKER, French platform specializing in construction logistics and last-mile delivery for construction materials
about.mission_content: BRIKER has set out to revolutionize construction logistics by making material supply and delivery more efficient, faster, traceable and responsible. We combine technology, field operations and local partnerships to optimize supply chains, reduce costs and minimize the environmental impact of construction site deliveries.
about.services_content: BRIKER offers a modular set of services: construction material delivery via professional carriers, a marketplace for new and used materials and equipment, rental between construction professionals and connection with qualified service providers.
about.commitments_content: BRIKER is committed to promoting sustainable construction practices, optimizing delivery routes, using low-emission transport modes when possible and promoting material reuse through our marketplace, thereby reducing the carbon footprint of construction operations.
about.values_content: Reliability, transparency, responsibility and solidarity. We work with local partners and certified material suppliers to ensure quality and safety on construction sites.
about.intro_content: BRIKER is a French platform specializing in construction logistics, offering complete solutions for construction professionals, contractors and suppliers. This connection is at the heart of our offer: we facilitate supply from major retailers like Castorama and Leroy Merlin, and ensure delivery directly to construction sites.
about.security_content: BRIKER offers construction professionals complete security by guaranteeing a contractual framework, prior verification of suppliers and complete traceability of material deliveries to construction sites.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.meta_description: Contact the BRIKER team - Customer support, business inquiries, personal data
contact.subtitle: Our team is here to help. Whether for a business inquiry, a question about your personal data or technical assistance.
contact.form_description: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.quick_help_description: Download our mobile app for instant support
contact.business_hours_description: Our teams are available to assist you
contact.hours_note: Note: Outside these hours, you can leave a message via the form or send us an email. We will respond on our next business day.
